title: Ep. 562 - F-F-Fund The Police!
description:
Released criminals re-offend, statue-topplers can’t tell you about the historical figures they’re erasing, and celebrities have had enough!

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/knowles
